extends Object

      int getDefaultDpi()
      Default DPI setting that should be used when processing scalable image formats (eps, pdf, svg).

      True if GraphicsMagick should be used instead of regular ImageMagick.
      int hashCode() 
      boolean isUseThumbnail()
      Should the thumbnail argument be used instead of the resize argument when resizing to a smaller image? Thumbnail is faster but might result in lower quality images.

      • getEnabled

        public Boolean getEnabled()
        True if image magick transformer should be created.

      • getPath

        public String getPath()
        Path to the ImageMagick installation.

      • getPriority

        public Integer getPriority()
        Priority for the ImageMagick transformer.

      • getUseGraphicsMagick

        public Boolean getUseGraphicsMagick()
        True if GraphicsMagick should be used instead of regular ImageMagick.

      • getUseGhostScript

        public Boolean getUseGhostScript()
        True if ghostscript is supported on the GraphicsMagick installation.

      • getDefaultQuality

        public int getDefaultQuality()
        Default quality setting that should be used when doing transforms.

      • getDefaultDpi

        public int getDefaultDpi()
        Default DPI setting that should be used when processing scalable image formats (eps, pdf, svg).

      • getFilter

        public String getFilter()
        Filter that should be used when resizing images. Can be null in which case no explicit filter will be set.

      • isUseThumbnail

        public boolean isUseThumbnail()
        Should the thumbnail argument be used instead of the resize argument when resizing to a smaller image? Thumbnail is faster but might result in lower quality images.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(Boolean enabled)
        True if image magick transformer should be created.

      • setPath

        public void setPath(String path)
        Path to the ImageMagick installation.

      • setPriority

        public void setPriority(Integer priority)
        Priority for the ImageMagick transformer.

      • setUseGraphicsMagick

        public void setUseGraphicsMagick(Boolean useGraphicsMagick)
        True if GraphicsMagick should be used instead of regular ImageMagick.

      • setUseGhostScript

        public void setUseGhostScript(Boolean useGhostScript)
        True if ghostscript is supported on the GraphicsMagick installation.

      • setDefaultQuality

        public void setDefaultQuality(int defaultQuality)
        Default quality setting that should be used when doing transforms.

      • setDefaultDpi

        public void setDefaultDpi(int defaultDpi)
        Default DPI setting that should be used when processing scalable image formats (eps, pdf, svg).

      • setFilter

        public void setFilter(String filter)
        Filter that should be used when resizing images. Can be null in which case no explicit filter will be set.

      • setUseThumbnail

        public void setUseThumbnail(boolean useThumbnail)
        Should the thumbnail argument be used instead of the resize argument when resizing to a smaller image? Thumbnail is faster but might result in lower quality images.
